title: Can I sell online (on Flipkart, Amazon) the products I have bought online? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes you can. But make sure you do not sell on the same site, from where you bought, this is just a safety thing i am suggesting. Also raise legal tax invoice and pay tax whatever is there, this business cannot be just for fun, and all legal formalities need to be done. I am a seller and what you are thinking is not going to make you earn profits as all websites will charge your commissions ranging from 10–30% depending on products and categories. Buying online and re-selling even if you have at a discounted rate and coupons i believe you do not have such discounts, if you want to sell online you need atleast 50% margin, that too you will realise after some months whether you are actually making profits, so beware.
Clearly Not, First You Need Brand Authorization Letter for Selling Specific Brand. and If You have It you can Buy at Cheap Rate directly from Dealer or Manufacturer.
Legally you cannot.  But if you are ready to some good up in between then you can sell it. You should have a TIN and VAT documents to be legally able to sell on online portals to raise an invoice.
